title: Did Trump Bragg own the Greatest Building in Manhattan after the 9/11 attacks?
subtitle: Donald Trump spoke of the existence of the longest building in central Manhattan after the 9/11 attacks, but whether "bragging" was in the eye of the headmaster.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Donald Trump boasted that he had the longest building in central Manhattan following the 9/11 attacks that destroyed the World Trade Center.
